channel.title: Topojson on Martin Chorley
channel.description: Recent content in Topojson on Martin Chorley

item.title: GeoJSON and topoJSON for UK boundaries
item.description: I’ve just put an archive online containing GeoJSON and topoJSON for UK boundary data. It’s all stored on Github, with a viewer and download site hosted on Github pages. Browser for the UK topoJSON stored in the Github repository The data is all created from shapefiles released by the Office of National Statistics, Ordnance Survey and National Records Scotland, all under the Open Government and OS OpenData licences.
